channel.title: SourceForge.net: SF.net Project News: Pootle, Virtaal & The Translate Toolkit
channel.description: SF.net Project News: Pootle, Virtaal & The Translate Toolkit (translate project) - Tools for localization: Pootle: web based translation management system. Virtaal: Computer Aided Translation (CAT) tool, Translate Toolkit: QA, format conversion and support (PO, Java .properties, OpenOffice, Mozilla, XLIFF, TMX, TBX, CSV, Qt .ts)
channel.copyright: Copyright and acceptable use information for this RSS feed may be found at: http://p.sf.net/sourceforge/terms

image.title: SourceForge.net logo
image.description: The world's largest Open Source software development website

item.title: Translate Toolkit 1.11.0
item.description: Minor changes over the 1.11.0-rc1 release. This release contains many improvements and bug fixes. While it contains many general improvements, it also specifically contains needed changes for the upcoming Pootle 2.5.1 and Virtaal releases.
item.author: dwaynebailey@users.sourceforge.net (Dwayne Bailey)

item.title: Pootle 2.5.1-rc1 Released
item.description: Major release of Pootle. New features include: goals, tags, extension action and a Pootle API. All users are encouraged to perform a test upgrade.
item.author: dwaynebailey@users.sourceforge.net (Dwayne Bailey)

item.title: Translate Toolkit 1.11.0-rc1
item.description: This release contains many improvements and bug fixes. While it contains many general improvements, it also specifically contains needed changes for the upcoming Pootle 2.5.1 and Virtaal releases.
item.author: dwaynebailey@users.sourceforge.net (Dwayne Bailey)

item.title: Pootle 2.5.0 Released
item.description: Major release of Pootle with many, many new features. All users are encouraged to upgrade.
item.author: dwaynebailey@users.sourceforge.net (Dwayne Bailey)

item.title: Translate Toolkit 1.10.0
item.description: This release contains many improvements and bug fixes. While it contains many general improvements, it also specifically contains needed changes for the upcoming Pootle 2.5.0.
item.author: dwaynebailey@users.sourceforge.net (Dwayne Bailey)

item.title: Pootle 2.1.6 Released
item.description: Restored compatibility with the latest Django releases and some bug fixes. All users are encouraged to upgrade.
item.author: alaaosh@users.sourceforge.net (Alaa Abd El Fattah)

item.title: Translate Toolkit 1.9.0 Released
item.description: This release contains many improvements and bug fixes. While it contains many general improvements, it also specifically contains needed changes for the upcoming Pootle 2.1.6 and Virtaal 0.7.
item.author: alaaosh@users.sourceforge.net (Alaa Abd El Fattah)

item.title: Pootle 2.1.5 Released
item.description: A quick bug fix release to celebrate the new Year. Please welcome Pootle 2.1.5!
item.author: alaaosh@users.sourceforge.net (Alaa Abd El Fattah)

item.title: Pootle 2.1.4 Released
item.description: We thought we'd wrap up the year with one more bug fix release, Please welcome Pootle 2.1.4
item.author: alaaosh@users.sourceforge.net (Alaa Abd El Fattah)

item.title: Pootle 2.1.3 Released
item.description: It's been less than three weeks since the we released Pootle 2.1.2 but we've fixed a couple of critical bugs affecting many users so it's time for another bug fix release. Please welcome Pootle 2.1.3
item.author: alaaosh@users.sourceforge.net (Alaa Abd El Fattah)

item.title: Translate Toolkit 1.8.1
item.description: Today the Translate team released version 1.8.1 of the Translate Toolkit. The Translate Toolkit contains many useful tools for translation, management, and quality control. It is the technology platform for Pootle, Virtaal, and other software.
item.author: alaaosh@users.sourceforge.net (Alaa Abd El Fattah)

item.title: Pootle 2.1.2 Released including security fix
item.description:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/translate/files/Pootle/2.1.2/Pootle-2.1.2.tar.bz2/download

This release includes an important security fix to a cross site scripting vulnerability in the translate page. All users are encouraged to upgrade immediately.
item.author: alaaosh@users.sourceforge.net (Alaa Abd El Fattah)

item.title: Pootle 2.1.1 Released
item.description:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/translate/files/Pootle/2.1.1/Pootle-2.1.1.tar.bz2/download

This release brings the ability to migrate data between
item.author: alaaosh@users.sourceforge.net (Alaa Abd El Fattah)

item.title: Pootle 2.1.0 released
item.description: This is a major new release after a long period of development. It has many new features and improvements. There were about a thousand commits since version 2.0 (excluding Toolkit commits).
item.author: friedelwolff@users.sourceforge.net (F Wolff)

item.title: Translate Toolkit 1.8.0
item.description:
This release contains several improvements and bug fixes. It is required for Pootle 2.1, and is also recommended for Pootle 2.0 installations. There were over 300 commits since version 1.7.0.

This work was made possible by volunteers and our funders:
item.author: friedelwolff@users.sourceforge.net (F Wolff)

item.title: Pootle 2.0.5 released
item.description: This is a bugfix release but it also introduces 3 new translations (Uighur, Hungarian and Portuguese) and updates to Croatian translation is almost done (currently at 70%).
item.author: alaaosh@users.sourceforge.net (Alaa Abd El Fattah)

item.title: Pootle 2.0.4 released
item.description: This release fixes incompatibility issues with the latest Django
item.author: friedelwolff@users.sourceforge.net (F Wolff)
